Dimension: 96.6 mm x 33.5 mm x 29.7 mm (3.8″ x 1.3″ x 1.2″); 44.7 mm with flange (1.8″ with flange)
Light modes: high, medium, low, night flash and day flash
Lumens: 800 high, 400 medium, 200 low, night flash and day flash
Battery life:
1.5 hours, high
3 hours, medium
6 hours, low
25 hours, day flash
6 hours night flash
